price: 23. Ye Allah, nzambe mosusu azali te ya kobondela na bosôló sé ye, mokonzi mosantu, azali kimia mobateli, akonza kala, azali nguya, azali sukisa, atonda lolendo, nkembo na Allah wa likolo na maye bazali kosangisa ye na yango.
arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡقُدُّوسُ ٱلسَّلَٰمُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُ ٱلۡمُهَيۡمِنُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡجَبَّارُ ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa al-maliku al-qudūsu al-salāmu al-mu'minu al-muhayminu al-ʿazīzu al-jabāru al-mutakabiru sub'ḥāna al-lahi ʿammā yush'rikūna
